overview:
Terra is the Director of MarCom for Roost. www.roost.com, www.blog.roost.com, www.facebook.com/roost, www.facebook.com/roostacademy, @roost, @terrarose

Personal blog: http://soshul.blogspot.com/

Prior to Roost, Terra had been working as an independent business development and marketing consultant. She has helped companies get off the ground in terms of logistics and operations as well as building a sales/business development teams.

Past Engagements Include: Neighborcity.com Pacific Equity Xetus Davidovits & Co. World Wide Lexicon Project Haku Wale Soshul.com California Wine Brokers Sheckys.com Girlsintech.net fffabulous.com Stealth scheduling website for women Watku
